Toa Nokama

Back

A 3D Model of Toa Nokama, from a franchise most people who find this should already be aware of. I spent way too goddamn long making this model, and now finally, it is published for purchase! It is fully rigged and has a bunch of various features, like easily alterable lights of a few kinds, a “vocoder” mouth thingy with the basic five vowel positions, a spinny back engine thing, and pistons.

Link to the purchase page
